root.name: The Impossible Game
root.description: The Impossible Game is a game for the Xbox 360 (available in the Xbox Live Marketplace's Indie Games section), the PSP and PlayStation 3 (as a PSP Mini), and for Android, iOS, Symbian^3 and Windows Phone handsets.Its objective is misleadingly simple: the player controls a box in constant motion that must avoid spikes and other obstacles.A user-defined checkpointing system allows players to set respawn points should they fail. However, the game is not considered complete until the player can get through each course in one go without using checkpoints.
